Width Property

CDXML Name:Width
CDX Constant Name:kCDXProp_Width
CDX Constant Value:0x0812
Data Size:CDXCoordinate
Property of objects:kCDXObj_Page, kCDXObj_TLCSpot
First written/read in:ChemDraw 6.0
Required?Until ChemDraw 7.0

Description:

The width of an object in CDX coordinate units, possibly in a rotated or skewed frame.

When used as a property of a document, this property is meaningful only for documents with a DrawingSpaceType of type Poster. This value overrides he default document width will be used as specified in the kCDXProp_MacPrintInfo property.

If this property is absent:

When used as a property of a document, the default document width will be used as specified in the kCDXProp_MacPrintInfo property. When used for other objects, the width will be assumed to be zero.
